title: Episode 282: French Desserts
description: This week on Eat Your Words, host Cathy Erway is joined in the studio by Hillary Davis, author, food journalist, cooking instructor, and writer and creator of the popular food blog Marché Dimanche. Davis is the author of Les Desserts, Le French Oven, French Comfort Food, Cuisine Niçoise, and A Million A Minute. She is presently at work on her fifth cookbook and a novel.
author: info@heritageradionetwork.org (Heritage Radio Network)
